notes: Hong Kong innings: Mohammad Rafique 1 illegal over past the limit of 10
Bangladesh 50 in 13.1 overs (Javed Omar 14*, Habibul Bashar 17*)
Bangladesh 100 in 23 overs (Javed Omar 44*, Rajin Saleh 0*)
Bangladesh 150 in 35.5 overs (Mushfiqur Rahman 9*, Khaled Mashud 3*)
Bangladesh 200 in 47.2 overs (Khaled Mahmud 14*, Tapash Baisya 0*)

milestones.description: Javed Omar and Habibul Bashar's 85-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 2nd wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 82 between Habibul Bashar and Rajin Saleh
Khaled Mashud has become the top scorer for BAN in ODIs with 995 runs, going past Akram Khan's 976
Bangladesh's 117-run win against Hong Kong is the largest margin of victory in terms of runs in ODIs, beating 62-run win against Pakistan

stories.title: Bangladesh outclass Hong Kong
stories.subTitle: Hong Kong v Bangladesh, Asia Cup, 1st ODI
stories.summary: Hong Kong began brightly to restrict Bangladesh to 221, but were outclassed later when Bangladesh's bowlers turned up the heat
